Title: The New Industrialists | Exploring how software-defined vehicles are transforming the auto industry
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Get an inside look at the future of automotive innovation in this exclusive interview with Ash Sethi, Program Director for Pave 360 at Siemens. Recorded for The New Industrialists, the conversation explores how software-defined vehicles, digital twins, and cloud-powered development are transforming the auto industry. Learn how Siemens’ Pace 360 Automotive platform—built in collaboration with Microsoft Azure—is accelerating software development, enabling real-time simulation, and shaping the next generation of autonomous and electric vehicles.

Learn more: https://msft.it/6052QBs2G

#Manufacturing #IndustrialAI #ManufacturingAI
